# Rename HTML templates

Learn how to rename HTML templates using the Zuora UI.

After an HTML template is created, you can rename it through the Zuora UI if needed.

To rename an HTML invoice template through the Zuora UI, perform the following steps:

1.  Click your avatar at the top right and navigate to .
2.  On the Manage Invoice, Credit/Debit Memo Templates tab, click the HTML template that you want to rename. The selected template is displayed in the online HTML template editor.
3.  In the HTML template editor, click the Rename icon ![](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/0e55aa7f-5f04-4840-8282-f3546c787df2?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..dU6KiQRspxU3OVYkCP9_gOwlUHHoPkljB5r3_fRnrXY) .
4.  In the Rename dialog that is displayed, enter the new template name in the New Name field and click Rename .

The HTML template is renamed.
